m_szDocTitle: Protocol for a remotely controlled videoconferencing robot - INTOUCH TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Protocol for a remotely controlled videoconferencing robot Document Type and Number: United States Patent 9375843 Abstract: A robotic system that includes a robot and a remote station. The remote station can generate control commands that are transmitted to the robot through a broadband network. The control commands can be interpreted by the robot to induce action such as robot movement or focusing a robot camera. The robot can generate reporting commands that are transmitted to the remote station through the broadband network. The reporting commands can provid
